about_the_game:
DragonClash is an exciting single-player card game of strategic dragon combat set in a war-torn, modern-day world. Each match offers a rich, RPG-lite experience, where you'll hatch a dragon, raise and develop it, and battle a ruthless rival out to steal your dragon egg - all in about 30-minutes!

In this demo, players are challenged to master the destructive fire of the Red Breather Game Deck. Unleash his powerful attacks against a variety of rivals, and prove your mettle to challenge Yabul, a unique boss encounter. Improve your red dragon lair and earn milestones to commemorate your brood's success.

Purchase the full game to unlock all four Game Decks and lairs, additional boss encounters, and over 100 milestones!
detailed_description:
DragonClash is an exciting single-player card game of strategic dragon combat set in a war-torn, modern-day world. Each match offers a rich, RPG-lite experience, where you'll hatch a dragon, raise and develop it, and battle a ruthless rival out to steal your dragon egg - all in about 30-minutes!

In this demo, players are challenged to master the destructive fire of the Red Breather Game Deck. Unleash his powerful attacks against a variety of rivals, and prove your mettle to challenge Yabul, a unique boss encounter. Improve your red dragon lair and earn milestones to commemorate your brood's success.

Purchase the full game to unlock all four Game Decks and lairs, additional boss encounters, and over 100 milestones!
name: DragonClash Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: CPU with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 SM4.0 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In DragonClash, you control a mighty beast of legend, raising a dragon from hatchling to elder wyrm. Become the dragon and conquer all that oppose you in this exciting, single-player card game of strategic dragon combat.
